name: Edward R. DANISHEFSKY, Paul J. Stavnicky, and Pennsylvania State Troopers Association, Petitioners/Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Thomas P. Foley, Secretary, Department of Labor and Industry, Cynthia M. Maleski, Commissioner, Insurance Department, and Catherine Baker Knoll, State Treasurer, Respondents/Appellees

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: Edward R. DANISHEFSKY, Paul J. Stavnicky, and Pennsylvania State Troopers Association, Petitioners/Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Thomas P. Foley, Secretary, Department of Labor and Industry, Cynthia M. Maleski, Commissioner, Insurance Department, and Catherine Baker Knoll, State Treasurer, Respondents/Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed. 165 Pa.Cmwlth. 223, 645 A2d 305.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Edward R. DANISHEFSKY, Paul J. Stavnicky, and Pennsylvania State Troopers Association, Petitioners/Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Thomas P. Foley, Secretary, Department of Labor and Industry, Cynthia M. Maleski, Commissioner, Insurance Department, and Catherine Baker Knoll, State Treasurer, Respondents/Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 21, 1995.
